Title: WinMap
Description: WinMap is an analysis tool used to take a “snapshot” of a window’s controls, compare it to a previous “snapshot”, and display which controls have been altered between releases.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WinMap is an analysis tool used to take a “snapshot” of a window’s controls, compare it to a previous “snapshot”, and display which controls have been altered between releases.

It is part of a larger suite called ProdUI, which handles automating windows controls. The ProdUI project can be found Here.

Source code is maintained on a Google Code  project, though releases will be handled through CodePlex

 

10/09/11 New Release - The initial release is available!
